treatment-md.title: Typhlocharis deferreri Zaballos & Pérez-González, 2011, new species
treatment-md.article-title: A new species of Typhlocharis Dieck, 1869 (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Anillini) from South Spain, with notes on the phylogenetic value of sexually related characters and the presence of stridulatory organ (pars stridens) in the genus
